PARAGRAPH.STRING: is mountain in the Dinarides of Bosnia and Herzegovina, located in northern Herzegovina, most of
is located in the Herzegovina-Neretva Canton municipalities of East Mostar and Jablanica while the smaller part of
, around 10% is located in the municipality to Posušje. The highest peak is 2228 metres.

is surrounded by the river Neretva from the east (20 km), its tributaries Doljanka (18 km) from the north and Drežanka (19.8 km) from the south, the Dugo Polje field (12 km) and Vran mountain from west.

consists of several plateaus -- Plas and Muharnica on north, Mala Čvrsnica on south. There are more than ten summits above 2000 m (Plocno 2228 m, Veliki Jelinak 2179 m, Veliki Vilinac 2118 m, etc.), vertical cliffs (Pesti brdo, Mezica stijene, Strmenica ...).
also includes lakes of Blidinje, Crepulja and Crvenjak. The Diva Grabovica canyon (6.2 km) goes into
three climate areas: conifers above 1200 m, plateau with grass and junipers; numerous endemic species (like Munika Pine).
is well known as a home of chamois.
